title: Everfair - complex response to her experience

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Shawl uses literary elements and techniques to portray Lisette’s complex response to her experience of riding her bicycle.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Shawl uses literary elements and techniques to portray Lisette’s complex response to her experience of riding her bicycle.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
